If not, see 23 // <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 24 30 #ifndef _GLIBCXX_ERASE_IF_H 31 #define _GLIBCXX_ERASE_IF_H 1 32 33 #pragma GCC system_header 34 35 #if __cplusplus >= 201402L 36 37 #include <bits/c++config.h> 38 39 namespace std 40 { 41 _GLIBCXX_BEGIN_NAMESPACE_VERSION 42 43 #if __cplusplus > 201703L 44 # define __cpp_lib_erase_if 202002L 45 #endif 46 47 namespace __detail 48 { 49 template<typename _Container, typename _UnsafeContainer, 50 typename _Predicate> 51 typename _Container::size_type 52 __erase_nodes_if(_Container& __cont, const _UnsafeContainer& __ucont, 53 _Predicate __pred) 54 { 55 typename _Container::size_type __num = 0; 56 for (auto __iter = __ucont.begin(), __last = __ucont.end(); 57 __iter != __last;) 58 { 59 if (__pred(*__iter)) 60 { 61 __iter = __cont.erase(__iter); 62 ++__num; 63 } 64 else 65 ++__iter; 66 } 67 return __num; 68 } 69 } // namespace __detail 70 71 _GLIBCXX_END_NAMESPACE_VERSION 72 } // namespace std 73 74 #endif // C++14 75 76 #endif // _GLIBCXX_ERASE_IF_H
